entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
